title: Business Analyst
description:
Budget: 9 LPA (Max)

Experience Required: 2.6-5 years (In RPA)

Strong understanding of RPA tools (e.g., Automation Anywhere, UiPath, Blue Prism) and their capabilities.




Roles and Responsibilities:

Requirement Gathering and Analysis:

Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and document business requirements for automation initiatives.
Analyze and prioritize business processes for automation suitability.

Process Mapping and Documentation:

Develop detailed process maps and document workflows for selected processes.
Create and maintain Business Requirement Documents (BRD) and Process Design Documents (PDD).

Feasibility Assessment:

Assess technical feasibility and provide recommendations for automation solutions.
Liaise with technical teams to ensure the alignment of automation strategies with business goals.

Solution Design:

Collaborate with developers to design RPA solutions that meet business objectives.
Ensure the proposed solution aligns with organizational standards and best practices.

Testing and Validation:

Participate in User Acceptance Testing (UAT) to validate automation solutions.
Document test results and assist in resolving any issues or discrepancies.

Stakeholder Management and Training:

Act as a liaison between business users and technical teams.
Provide training and support to end-users on automated processes.

Continuous Improvement:

Monitor automated processes post-deployment to ensure efficiency and effectiveness.
Identify areas for optimization and suggest improvements.
